name: WP Food ordering and Restaurant Menu
author: Ex-Themes

sections.description:
WP-Food

If you own a restaurant, café or food service business, WP Food is a must-have plugin. Designed to make ordering menu items seamless and hassle-free, WP Food is the simplest way for your business to display food items and for your customers to order. With the intelligent WP Food plugin, you can manage everything from showcasing your menu to receiving and processing orders all from one handy place. For your customers this means a straightforward way to place an order and the very best user experience, ensuring they’ll be back – again and again. It helps you create and display food menu with many styles, layouts and anywhere via shortcodes or widget, support WPBakery Page Builder, Elementor, Site Origin ….

  • Demo

Features Of Free Version

  • 4 Styles support
  • Online Food ordering and manager
  • Fully responsive and mobile ready.
  • Unlimited WP-Food anywhere.
  • WP-Food with many columns(2, 3, 4, 5)
  • WP-Food with Grid, List, Carousel(Slider view)
  • Ajax load more foods
  • Vertical and horizontal support
  • Unlimited customize with font
  • WPBakery Page support
  • Supper easy configuration
  • Shortcode builder support, easy to create shortcode with few click
  • Free Version Demo

Pro Version Features

  • 10+ Best Beautiful Layouts
  • Grid shortcode with 4 style
  • List shortcode with 3 styles
  • Table shortcode with 1 styles
  • Carousel shortcode with 4 styles
  • Menu filter(Category filter)
  • Ajax load more + pagination
  • Woocommerce integrate
  • Print order support
  • Minimum Order Amount
  • Email notification to admin and customer after order
  • Open and close time
  • RTL Support

  • Free email support

  • Upgrade Pro Version
sections.installation:
Install via WordPress admin
1. Login to WordPress Admin > menu panel go to Plugins > Add New > Upload to install plugin
2. Click Upload > Browse your download package to select installation files.
3. Click Install Now button.
4. Once it’s uploaded, click the Activate link.
sections.faq:
How do I create food info?

You could follow guideline in document in https://exthemes.net/wp-food-lite/doc/#!/create-foodinfo

Can it be translated into other languages?

Yes, you can install Loco translate plugin to change it.

Is there a way to disable link of Single member page?

You can disable it in setting: Food->Setting->Disable link & Single member page.

>How do I deactivate, reinstall, and update pro version without losing all the profiles I created?

All food data still save in database although you uninstall or delete plugin, you just need delete old version and install version pro. Addition, shortcode also same structure with free version so you don’t need change shortcode.

>How do I disable or enable ordering online?

You can control it in setting: Food->Setting->Food ordering via. When select Built-in, it will enable ordering. If you want to disable ordering, you just need choice Disable
